alert.note: Alert for Morris (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:13AM EST until January 10 at 5:20PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Rockaway River At Boonton Above Resvr affecting Morris County. For the Rockaway River...including Boonton Above Resvr...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rockaway River at Boonton Above Resvr. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, The Rockaway River leaves its banks and begins to flood the river parking lot at St. Clare`s Hospital. At 3.5 feet, The Rockaway River leaves its banks and floods adjacent parks and trails in Denville including Gardner park. At 5.0 feet, Savage Road and other roads around Gardner Park in Denville flood. At 5.5 feet, The main parking lot at St. Clare`s Hospital begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.6 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 4.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.7 feet on 12/18/2023. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Stg Time Date Rockaway River Boonton Above R 4.5 4.5 Wed 9 am 3.2 2.5 4.6 10am 1/10 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 530 PM EST.
